name: Digital Sustainability Manager Full Curriculum (EQF Level 4)
description: Full curriculum for Digital Sustainability Manager at EQF Level 4
program_learning_outcomes: Apply fundamental digital sustainability principles and methodologies in structured environments
Utilize appropriate tools and technologies to support sustainability objectives in digital contexts
Demonstrate awareness of ethical and environmental implications of digital systems and decisions
Communicate sustainability concepts and practices effectively with diverse stakeholders
Implement basic sustainability improvements in digital systems and processes
Manage digital resources to maximize efficiency and minimize environmental impact

modules.name: Net-Zero IT Infrastructure (EQF 8 Version)
modules.description: Principles and practices for carbon-neutral IT infrastructures (This module has been adapted for EQF level 8.)
learning_outcomes: Critically evaluate approaches for achieving carbon neutrality in IT infrastructure.
Evaluate strategies for measuring and reducing carbon footprint of technology systems.
Design and implement net-zero IT infrastructures in various organizational contexts.
